section.title: Nova volume attach error, not JSON serializable
Problem
section.para: When you attach a nova volume to a VM, you will see the error with stack trace in /var/log/nova/nova-volume.log. The JSON serializable issue is caused by an RPC response timeout.

section.title: Solution
section.para: Make sure your iptables allow port 3260 comunication on the ISC controller. Run the following command.

screen.userinput: iptables -I INPUT <Last Rule No> -p tcp --dport 3260 -j ACCEPT

section.para: If the port communication is properly configured, you can try running the following command.$ service iptables stop
If you try these solutions and still get the RPC response time out, you probably have an ISC controller and KVM host incompatibility issue. Make sure they are compatible.
